Keywords: Future , Robot , Sentinel

Special Powers
ELIMINATING HOMO SUPERIOR: When a friendly character with the Sentinel keyword is KO'd, give Nimrod the Greater a Library token. // FREE: Remove Remove 3 Library tokens and choose an opposing character within range and line of fire. If you did, the chosen character can't use powers until Nimrod the Greater takes damage. Protected: Pulse Wave.
A LIVING DATABASE: Outwit. // When Nimrod the Greater starts the game, you may choose a friendly character with the Sentinel keyword. When Nimrod the Greater uses Outwit, he may count range and draw line of fire from the square of the chosen character.
